definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: All test results are negative. Zhijiangmycin was non inducer in this condition.
sentences.chinese: 因此在本試驗條件下，之江菌素是一種非誘變劑。

sentences.english: The linear relationship between the dosage and SCE frequencies was analysed.
sentences.chinese: 誘變劑劑量與誘發SCE頻率呈線性關係。

sentences.english: A large number of hydrocarbons such as benzopyrene are also mutagenic.
sentences.chinese: 大量碳氫化合物如苯並芘也是誘變劑。
